courses.name: Standardisation Training Course for Space Applications

profile_positions.description: Selecting, training and supporting a team of 35 PhD students as mentors for new MSc students in the Electronics and Computer Science department. Responsible for checking budgets, processing claims, evaluating the program and implementing improvements.
profile_positions.title: Leader of the MSc Mentoring Program

profile_positions.description: Mentored two groups of international MSc students in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science. Supported them with their pastoral and academic needs and ensured a smooth sailing into their new environment.
profile_positions.title: Mentor for International Master Students

profile_positions.description: Four-day Training Course on Standardisation at ESA's Centre in Redu, Belgium.
profile_positions.title: Standardisation Training Course

profile_positions.description: Participating in workshops, training, special events, visiting exhibitions and industrial sites.
profile_positions.title: Mentee in the Bosch & IBM FemaleTalents Program

profile_positions.description: Programming VBA macros in Excel for production analysis and process optimization using Lean Six Sigma methods.
profile_positions.title: Student Employee

profile_positions.description: Selected for the 4-week Seeds for the Future Program, receiving a two-week crash course in Mandarin at the Beijing Language and Culture University, got a tour in the Huawei manufacturing sites in Shenzhen, visited the Technologies Corporate Campus in Shanghai and visited Hong Kong.
profile_positions.title: Seeds For The Future Student

profile_positions.description: Programming VBA macros in Excel to update and analyse databases related to product safety. Investigating and evaluating returned products and conducted chemical and mechanical lifetime testing of components.
profile_positions.title: Product Safety Intern

company.name: Health and Beauty Business Media GmbH

profile_positions.description: Updating customer databases and processing pre-sale ticket orders for trade fairs as well as on site in Salzburg, Austria and Munich, Germany. Supporting the sales team for Health and Beauty trade fairs in Leipzig, Munich, Salzburg and for the fitness trade fair FiBo in Essen and Cologne. Hosting training sessions for further education in the Health and Beauty headquarter in Karlsruhe.
profile_positions.title: Student Worker

volunteer_experiences.role: Chair of the Marketing Task Force

volunteer_experiences.description: Responsible for supporting the strategy, planning and execution of the society's member communications (public relations, internal communications, social media and online presence)

volunteer_experiences.role: Student Editor for the IEEE Photonics Newsletter
volunteer_experiences.description: Responsible for the column "Photonics Worldwide - This is my Lab", where I identify new stories and interview participants for every edition.

volunteer_experiences.role: Chair of the IEEE Studentbranch Southampton
volunteer_experiences.description: Me and my team organised regular talks from academia and industry for students and University staff to create a networking platform and give the opportunity to broaden technical knowledge.
Represented the municipal community's interests and setting targets, reviewing and approving municipal developments.

volunteer_experiences.role: Team Leader for the Business Innovation Program
volunteer_experiences.description: Lead a team of 4 students from diverse disciplines to identify the challenges small and medium sized enterprises (SMEs) face when scaling up. Developed a project strategy, contacted 100 businesses, collected information, analysed data and reported to our client Get Consultants.
Organising the IEEE Women in Engineering International Leadership Summit in Southampton.
Bringing science and technology to schools and the wider community. Presented in a BBC4 Documentary and two BBC Radio Solent shows.
